report.title: Vaginal Insertion
report.author: Gloria
report.bodytext: I had been taking Diazepam as a recreational drug for about a year probably 1-2 times a week oraly. On this occasion I had been having pretty nasty fucking stomach cramps and didn't want to ingest anything at all so I decided to try a little experiment. I decded to administer the tablets into my cunt by way of an old syringe with the top cut off. Well guys I'll never go back to oral again. WOW. /n /n Keep it sweet.
